## Public Member Functions

### getAlignment() {#a4d8579c6558228656059605b5c1c4fb7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Align llvm::CoroPromiseInst::getAlignment () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
The required alignment of the promise.

This must match the alignment of the promise alloca in the coroutine.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/coroutines/coroinstr-h/#l00501">501</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/coroutines/coroinstr-h">CoroInstr.h</a>.
